query:
update underway.task
            set updated_at = now(),
                last_heartbeat_at = now()
            where id = $1
              and task_queue_name = $2
              and exists (
                  select 1
                  from underway.task_attempt
                  where task_id = $1
                    and task_queue_name = $2
                    and attempt_number = $3
                    and state = $4
              )
